title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Fry the pancetta in olive oil until crisp.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, then mix in the cheese.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with tikka masala paste and grill.
Fry onions and tomatoes in butter until soft.
Add coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes.
Mix in the grilled chicken and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
